text: magen athuru prashnayak…

eya uputa dakwana royitar puwath sewawa kiya sitinne, ban ki mun jagath mahalekam dhurayata yali tharaga kirimata sudanam wana awasthawaka ella wana mema chodana itha thiranathmaka wanu athi bawayi.munge kriyakarakam hamuwe jagath sanwidhanaya winiwidabhawayen thora saha gatalu rasak pawathina aayathanayak bawata pathwa thibe.
aarya gana nan dan mata sakayak enawa....
me sadhaka samanga mama mage wruththiya ayithiwasikam wenuwen handa nangima ee ayata loku prashnayak.
patta machan math pussage giye masayay .....
ee atharawaraye thamilnaduwa namathi kandamata uthuru nagenahira thallu wi yana aakarayata madhyama aanduwa durwala kara ema palath swayan palitha palath bawata pathkaranu atha.
me wage loku pracharayak aragena giya.
ehidi nirmala mahathmiya wisin siya samiyage ghathakayin janapathi sewane sitina bawata prakashakara thibina.
ese thiranayak gena athnam eyin kiyawenne podujana peramuna pakshayak lesa wadagath nowana bawayi.

sanda­ras jane­la­yen awith mulu kama­ra­yama eliya karayi.

ee wage kiyamanwala thiyena bhayanaka pala wipakaya thamayi, ooka ahapu api wage un nikan wakya rachana liyala kawi wage pas karanna hadana eka.

ee yakata witharayi thaththage hitha hadanna puluwan....

mema thiranathmaka jayagrahanaya athkaraganna ladde sowiyat sangamaye saha nagenahira yuropaye stalinwadi thanthrayanhi awasan maraniya arbudaya da, loka dhanawadaye praharaya hamuwe ekala pawathi maha kamkaru paksha saha wruththiya samithi wala yatath wimada, loka parimana adhirajyawadi nawa yatath wijithawadaya idiriye dhaneshwara jathikawadi wyaparawala pahadili belehinathwayada, yana mema pasubima thula ya yanna kisisethma ahambayak nowe.
matayi maෙg daru pawulatayi yanna enna thanak nathi wuna.
meya pihita aththe buddha mandiraye pitupasaya.

ese wuwada, ‘mrutha sharirayak athpath karaganne kumana kshudrajiwinda emenma ee sandaha kopamana wela gathaweda yanna dana ganimen aparadha waidya widyagnyayanta maranaya siduwu welawa saha aparadhayakata sambandha anekuth wisthara thiranaya kirima pinisa mrutha biyomaya upayogi kara gatha hakiya.’

mema karana adhyanaya kala ingrisin mathale, wellassa aadi karali walin mathuwu gamnayakathwaya nathi kirimata gamaralage modakamda, mahadana muththa ha golayan magin gam sabhawata ha game nayakathwaya upahasayata lak kara eya samanya jana manasin ayin karana ladi.

nirmanaye mula sita ma adhikshanaya karamin guru haru kam dun kathikacharya sujani wijesundara menawiya mahacharya pattrik rathnayaka, jyeshta kathikaracharya chandrasiri bogamuwa, jyeshta kathikaracharya uditha gunasekara, kathikacharya upul ranepura athuluwa prathibimba mulika kala adhyayana anshaye siyaluma aacharyabhawathunta sthuthi wantha wenawa.

esema mema thalak kramaya boho wita prayojanayata ganne kanthawanya.islamaya wisin kanthawanta laba di athi mema waraprasadayan samiyan mella kirimatath yoda ganna awastha oona tharamya.diwayina pura athi kadiwarunge nadu athara bohomayak godagasa aththe ek warak thalak kiyana kanthawangen me bawa manawa pahadili we.
thathpara hatharen hatharata wage aliya hondawala wathuren udata karala husma gannawa.
anka eken man nawathune naththe eeka sarthaka nathi hinda nennan...
e minissu hithapu widiyata hithala godak than walin yam yam dewal aragena...
mu me upadinna inna lamayi rassawata dala padiyen thagi illana katha ne kiyanne...
meya ‘aarthika sahayogithawa ha sanwardhanaya pilibanda wu sanwidhanaya’ wisin wiwidha awasthawaladi sakachchawata bandun kota atha.

ayata agema yahapath prathipaththi thibuna.

warayata kilomitar dekahamarak durin indiyanu oththu sewa wisin meheyawana guwanthotupelak thibima thulin ratata siduwana aarthika paduwata wada barapathala deshapalana saha yudamaya gatalukari thaththwayak pananangina bawata sakayak natha.
sinhala ha sahithya sangamaya
honda gaman wistharayak.
sadarayen piligannawa oyawath...
--thambaaru wijesekara sakachchawa 11:54, 28 agosthu 2010 (yutisi)
